definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

sentences.english: Smoke grenades are used for concealment while moving over open areas such as streets.
sentences.chinese: 烟幕弹用于开阔地或者街巷的隐蔽。

sentences.english: Pop some smoke and let me see your location.
sentences.chinese: 放烟幕弹，让我找找你们的位置。

sentences.english: Riot police hurled tear gas canisters and smoke bombs into the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察向人群中投掷了催泪瓦斯罐和烟幕弹。
我想知道他们在放什么烟幕弹。

sentences.english: Can be upgraded with hunter-killer missiles, searchlights, camo netting and smoke launchers.
sentences.chinese: 可装备猎杀导弹，探照灯，伪装网和烟幕弹。

sentences.english: Crick likens her departure to "the smoke of witchcraft" clearing from the group's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 克里克将她的离去比作消除团队眼前的“巫术烟幕”。

sentences.english: Lighting fires to create a smoke screen is an ancient ruse in military tactics.
sentences.chinese: 生火制造烟幕，是古老的战争诡术。

sentences.english: Which animals vanish in a smoke screen?
sentences.chinese: 什么动物会消失在“烟幕”里？

sentences.english: A pall stretched for miles away from the island.
sentences.chinese: 一股烟幕延伸出岛外达数英里之遥。

sentences.english: The smoke blackened the ceiling; The ceiling blackened.
Sexy question marks of smoke drifted up to the windows before vanishing.
sentences.chinese: 烟幕在消失之前形成了一个性感的问号。

sentences.english: When the smoke cleared, the mismatches started to emerge.
sentences.chinese: 当烟幕散尽后，开始出现失谐。

sentences.english: Our report draws the distinction between genuine debate and smokescreens, " Lambeck says.
sentences.chinese: 我们的报告意在区分真正的辩论和烟幕”，兰贝克说。

sentences.english: It may also be a smokescreen.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这也可能仅仅只是个烟幕弹。

sentences.english: Smoke bombs were thrown during the street riots.
sentences.chinese: 街道上出现骚乱时投放了烟幕弹。

sentences.english: There was stage smoke and glitter grit on the runway.
sentences.chinese: 在展示台上有舞台烟幕和闪光的沙砾。
